QuestData.Title: The Key of Warlord Zol'Maz
QuestData.Description: $n, we need a key to unlock the chains of the rhino god, Akali. Even now he is being prepared for the slaughter.$B$BThe Drakkari warlord, Zol'Maz, carries the key. Hearing of your exploits, he has secluded himself and his family at their stronghold up the steps to the northeast.$B$BThe warlord is strong and you will need help. If you were to combine the tiki, sword and incantation of his family members, you would be able to summon such help as you challenge him before his home's gate.
QuestData.LogDescription: Har'koa at Zim'Torga has asked you to acquire the Key of Warlord Zol'Maz.
QuestData.CompletionText: I cannot stress how important it is that you acquire the warlord's key no matter the cost.
QuestData.RewardText: It might have been better if I hadn't asked you to bring it back here instead of heading directly to Gundrak.$B$BHowever, I think that it's best that you hear what else I have to say first.
